item.title: WebVR for a Gamified IDE
item.description: In the first part of this blog post I discuss the idea of using virtual reality for gamification of manual tasks in the software development process. I introduce a demo project which allows source code visualization and manipulation in a generated Minecraft-like virtual reality. My initial presentation of the demo project was on ngconf 2017, and the project’s extension I presented on AngularUP 2017 during my talks “Mad Science with the Angular Compiler”.
